00019 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_SHARED_LIST_H
00020 #define _COPPERPLATE_SHARED_LIST_H
00021 
00022 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_LIST_H
00023 #error "Do not include this file directly. Use <copperplate/list.h> instead."
00024 #endif
00025 
00026 #define __hoff(h, a)  __memoff(h, a)
00027 #define __hptr(h, v)  ((struct holder *)__memptr(h, v))
00028 #define __hchk(h, a)  __memchk(h, a)
00029 
00030 struct holder {
00031         dref_type(struct holder *) next;
00032         dref_type(struct holder *) prev;
00033 };
00034 
00035 struct list {
00036         struct holder head;
00037 };
00038 
00039 static inline void __inith(void *heap, struct holder *holder)
00040 {
00041         assert(__hchk(heap, holder));
00042         holder->next = __hoff(heap, holder);
00043         holder->prev = __hoff(heap, holder);
00044 }
00045 
00046 static inline void inith(struct holder *holder)
00047 {
00048         __inith(__pshared_heap, holder);
00049 }
00050 
00051 static inline void __ath(void *heap, struct holder *head,
00052                          struct holder *holder)
00053 {
00054         /* Inserts the new element right after the heading one. */
00055         holder->prev = __hoff(heap, head);
00056         holder->next = head->next;
00057         __hptr(heap, holder->next)->prev = __hoff(heap, holder);
00058         head->next = __hoff(heap, holder);
00059 }
00060 
00061 static inline void ath(struct holder *head, struct holder *holder)
00062 {
00063         __ath(__pshared_heap, head, holder);
00064 }
00065 
00066 static inline void __dth(void *heap, struct holder *holder)
00067 {
00068         __hptr(heap, holder->prev)->next = holder->next;
00069         __hptr(heap, holder->next)->prev = holder->prev;
00070 }
00071 
00072 static inline void dth(struct holder *holder)
00073 {
00074         __dth(__pshared_heap, holder);
00075 }
00076 
00077 static inline void __list_init(void *heap, struct list *list)
00078 {
00079         __inith(heap, &list->head);
00080 }
00081 
00082 static inline void list_init(struct list *list)
00083 {
00084         __list_init(__pshared_heap, list);
00085 }
00086 
00087 static inline void __holder_init(void *heap, struct holder *holder)
00088 {
00089         __inith(heap, holder);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static inline void holder_init(struct holder *holder)
00093 {
00094         inith(holder);
00095 }
00096 
00097 static inline int __holder_linked(void *heap, const struct holder *holder)
00098 {
00099         return !(holder->prev == holder->next &&
00100                  holder->prev == __hoff(heap, holder));
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*
00104  * XXX: holder_init() is mandatory if you later want to use this
00105  * predicate.
00106  */
00107 static inline int holder_linked(const struct holder *holder)
00108 {
00109         return __holder_linked(__pshared_heap, holder);
00110 }
00111 
00112 static inline void __list_prepend(void *heap, struct holder *holder,
00113                                   struct list *list)
00114 {
00115         __ath(heap, &list->head, holder);
00116 }
00117 
00118 static inline void list_prepend(struct holder *holder, struct list *list)
00119 {
00120         __list_prepend(__pshared_heap, holder, list);
00121 }
00122 
00123 static inline void __list_append(void *heap, struct holder *holder,
00124                                  struct list *list)
00125 {
00126         __ath(heap, __hptr(heap, list->head.prev), holder);
00127 }
00128 
00129 static inline void list_append(struct holder *holder, struct list *list)
00130 {
00131         __list_append(__pshared_heap, holder, list);
00132 }
00133 
00134 static inline void __list_insert(void *heap, struct holder *next, struct holder *prev)
00135 {
00136         __ath(heap, prev, next);
00137 }
00138 
00139 static inline void list_insert(struct holder *next, struct holder *prev)
00140 {
00141         __list_insert(__pshared_heap, next, prev);
00142 }
00143 
00144 static inline void __list_join(void *heap, struct list *lsrc,
00145                                struct list *ldst)
00146 {
00147         struct holder *headsrc = __hptr(heap, lsrc->head.next);
00148         struct holder *tailsrc = __hptr(heap, lsrc->head.prev);
00149         struct holder *headdst = &ldst->head;
00150 
00151         __hptr(heap, headsrc->prev)->next = tailsrc->next;
00152         __hptr(heap, tailsrc->next)->prev = headsrc->prev;
00153         headsrc->prev = __hoff(heap, headdst);
00154         tailsrc->next = headdst->next;
00155         __hptr(heap, headdst->next)->prev = __hoff(heap, tailsrc);
00156         headdst->next = __hoff(heap, headsrc);
00157 }
00158 
00159 static inline void list_join(struct list *lsrc, struct list *ldst)
00160 {
00161         __list_join(__pshared_heap, lsrc, ldst);
00162 }
00163 
00164 static inline void __list_remove(void *heap, struct holder *holder)
00165 {
00166         __dth(heap, holder);
00167 }
00168 
00169 static inline void list_remove(struct holder *holder)
00170 {
00171         __list_remove(__pshared_heap, holder);
00172 }
00173 
00174 static inline void __list_remove_init(void *heap, struct holder *holder)
00175 {
00176         __dth(heap, holder);
00177         __inith(heap, holder);
00178 }
00179 
00180 static inline void list_remove_init(struct holder *holder)
00181 {
00182         __list_remove_init(__pshared_heap, holder);
00183 }
00184 
00185 static inline int __list_empty(void *heap, const struct list *list)
00186 {
00187         return list->head.next == __hoff(heap, &list->head);
00188 }
00189 
00190 static inline int list_empty(const struct list *list)
00191 {
00192         return __list_empty(__pshared_heap, list);
00193 }
00194 
00195 static inline struct holder *__list_pop(void *heap, struct list *list)
00196 {
00197         struct holder *holder = __hptr(heap, list->head.next);
00198         __list_remove_init(heap, holder);
00199         return holder;
00200 }
00201 
00202 static inline struct holder *list_pop(struct list *list)
00203 {
00204         return __list_pop(__pshared_heap, list);
00205 }
00206 
00207 static inline int __list_heading_p(void *heap, const struct holder *holder,
00208                                    const struct list *list)
00209 {
00210         return list->head.next == __hoff(heap, holder);
00211 }
00212 
00213 static inline int list_heading_p(const struct holder *holder,
00214                                  const struct list *list)
00215 {
00216         return __list_heading_p(__pshared_heap, holder, list);
00217 }
00218 
00219 #define list_entry(ptr, type, member)                           \
00220         container_of(ptr, type, member)
00221 
00222 #define __list_first_entry(heap, list, type, member)            \
00223         list_entry(__hptr((heap), (list)->head.next), type, member)
00224 
00225 #define list_first_entry(list, type, member)                    \
00226         __list_first_entry(__pshared_heap, list, type, member)
00227 
00228 #define __list_last_entry(heap, list, type, member)             \
00229         list_entry(__hptr((heap), (list)->head.prev), type, member)
00230 
00231 #define list_last_entry(list, type, member)                     \
00232         __list_last_entry(__pshared_heap, list, type, member)
00233 
00234 #define __list_pop_entry(heap, list, type, member) ({                   \
00235                         struct holder *__holder = __list_pop((heap), list); \
00236                         list_entry(__holder, type, member); })
00237 
00238 #define list_pop_entry(list, type, member)                              \
00239         __list_pop_entry(__pshared_heap, list, type, member)
00240 
00241 #define __list_for_each(heap, pos, list)                                \
00242         for (pos = __hptr((heap), (list)->head.next);                   \
00243              pos != &(list)->head; pos = __hptr((heap), (pos)->next))
00244 
00245 #define list_for_each(pos, list)                                        \
00246         __list_for_each(__pshared_heap, pos, list)
00247 
00248 #define __list_for_each_reverse(heap, pos, list)                        \
00249         for (pos = __hptr((heap), (list)->head.prev);                   \
00250              pos != &(list)->head; pos = __hptr((heap), (pos)->prev))
00251 
00252 #define list_for_each_reverse(pos, list)                                \
00253         __list_for_each_reverse(__pshared_heap, pos, list)
00254 
00255 #define __list_for_each_safe(heap, pos, tmp, list)                      \
00256         for (pos = __hptr((heap), (list)->head.next),                   \
00257                      tmp = __hptr((heap), (pos)->next);                 \
00258              pos != &(list)->head;                                      \
00259              pos = tmp, tmp = __hptr((heap), (pos)->next))
00260 
00261 #define list_for_each_safe(pos, tmp, list)                              \
00262         __list_for_each_safe(__pshared_heap, pos, tmp, list)
00263 
00264 #define __list_for_each_entry(heap, pos, list, member)                  \
00265         for (pos = list_entry(__hptr((heap), (list)->head.next),        \
00266                               typeof(*pos), member);                    \
00267              &(pos)->member != &(list)->head;                           \
00268              pos = list_entry(__hptr((heap), (pos)->member.next),       \
00269                               typeof(*pos), member))
00270 
00271 #define list_for_each_entry(pos, list, member)                          \
00272         __list_for_each_entry(__pshared_heap, pos, list, member)
00273 
00274 #define __list_for_each_entry_safe(heap, pos, tmp, list, member)        \
00275         for (pos = list_entry(__hptr((heap), (list)->head.next),        \
00276                               typeof(*pos), member),                    \
00277                      tmp = list_entry(__hptr((heap), (pos)->member.next), \
00278                                       typeof(*pos), member);            \
00279              &(pos)->member != &(list)->head;                           \
00280              pos = tmp, tmp = list_entry(__hptr((heap), (pos)->member.next), \
00281                                          typeof(*pos), member))
00282 
00283 #define list_for_each_entry_safe(pos, tmp, list, member)                \
00284         __list_for_each_entry_safe(__pshared_heap, pos, tmp, list, member)
00285 
00286 #define __list_for_each_entry_reverse(heap, pos, list, member)          \
00287         for (pos = list_entry(__hptr((heap), (list)->head.prev),        \
00288                               typeof(*pos), member);                    \
00289              &pos->member != &(list)->head;                             \
00290              pos = list_entry(__hptr((heap), pos->member.prev),         \
00291                               typeof(*pos), member))
00292 
00293 #define list_for_each_entry_reverse(pos, list, member)                  \
00294         __list_for_each_entry_reverse(__pshared_heap, pos, list, member)
00295 
00296 #endif /* !_COPPERPLATE_SHARED_LIST_H */
